website_summaries.verdict: The best if you want both effective weed killing and prevention of new growth. Provided you don't live in CA, it's the one to get for the most impressive results.
pros: Kills weeds and grass within hours and prevents new growth for nearly a year
cons: Somewhat pricey, and it doesn't go as far as others on our list - but it is more effective
Not available for purchase in CA due to herbicide regulations

customer_reviews.title: Works but not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Washed out of the gravel driveway after several days even though it said "rain ready in one hour" and left a large 20+ foot dead streak as well as aprx. 1-2 foot dead area on the low side of the driveway. Driveway started re-growing vegetation within 6 weeks. Definitely did not perform as a one year ground clear. It did do a good job on what was growing, but less than 3 months from original treatment you can't tell the drive was ever treated. :(
customer_reviews.author: M. Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Will put you at “Ground Zero” ....
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time with those ‘green’ or ‘safe’ products ..... you want vegetation gone? ..... just use this ..... do it right the first time ...... read the application instructions..... don’t apply it ahead of a rain shower, that’s just a block head move .....
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: I believe that I have durable weeds that are sturdy and tend to endure
customer_reviews.text: I finally found and used a product that actually works. It does not kill the weeds/plants as quickly as advertised, but they eventually disappear. I believe that I have durable weeds that are sturdy and tend to endure. I have purchased more than I probably need, but I will apply it again to ensure that the weeds are gone.
customer_reviews.author: John B Lo Coco

customer_reviews.title: Works, but very slow...
customer_reviews.text: I have read others reviews about how the formulation has apparently changed on this stuff. I can attest that it is working but very very slowly. I applied the chemical with the Ortho hose sprayer set for 8oz per gallon as per the instructions. The areas treated are dying off but it has been several weeks and the weeds are still up, but you can tell they are in fact starting to die off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Water in gently to roots the day after.
customer_reviews.text: This works well. The trick is to water in gently a day after application. Just to the roots. Kills all plants and prevents a run off if heavy rains come.
customer_reviews.author: SMCNY

customer_reviews.title: Agent orange redux
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for at least 20 yrs. I own a corner house with a LOT of pavement. Every year, when spring blooms, so does my pavement. Ground Clear takes care of that. I give it a good dose of Ground Clear, everything green on my pavement dies, then I just touch up as the weeds pop their ugly little heads up. Don't get this near your flowers, grass or plants. It doesn't like anything green. Good stuff if you don't feel like pulling weeds by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Moe's Mom

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product said will kill in 6 hrs..okay I waited for 2 days and still have weeds and grass..just use vinegar, salt and dish soap..
customer_reviews.author: ttb

customer_reviews.title: Not effective!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is after two weeks, and that's the 4th dose (which I doubled the amount of Groundclear that it said to use). My last ditch effort is to use it without adding any water, and I'm hoping it will kill the few weeds I have in areas I don't want anything growing. Good side is, It's really windy here, and at least I don't have to worry about the overspray killing the lawn. I don't know if this stuff gets old, but this is the second time I've gotten this product and had a problem. Unlikely that there was two bad batches.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I received an Ortho GroundClear Vegetation Killer with an electric power wand a while ago. I used the premixed amount in my original container and this purchase is a concentrated refill. I found that the stuff works really well. I have used it for about a month on the brick and pavers around my yard. It kills the weeds quickly and it is great to not picking the weeds out by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow instruction andvegetation grows back within two days or never leaves
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions on the container. I even put more chemical than water ratio than it called for. On the places I used it either nothing happened or within two days it was back. Had to buy more at Home Depot and put on weeds straight to get any results at all. Don't know if product sent through Amazon was inferior to same thing through Home Depot or instructions should have said not to dilute. So far weeds are brown for 5th day using undiluted solution. You do what you want to do. This is just my FYI
customer_reviews.author: Special Teacher

customer_reviews.title: This Ortho product does not work
customer_reviews.text: I re-checked my Amazon order, which shows Glyphosate 2.97%, visible results in 6 hours....the Ortho product I received did not have any Glyphosate, instead it showed Imazapyr in Active Ingredients....and did not say visible results in 6 hours....I followed the directions, carefully measured everything....I sprayed the weeds in the morning and the next morning there were no visible results so I sprayed again....and the next morning there was slight wilting.... so after 3 days and seeing little results, that was when I checked the label and saw there was no Glyphosate..... I will never buy another Ortho product...
customer_reviews.author: Lance W.

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work!
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this on over a week ago. Nothing even turned yellow. I used the strongest concentration and it didn’t rain for several days. At the same time I used a different brand of grass and weed killer around my flower beds and it was dying the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Beutel

customer_reviews.title: Kind of worked
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that I would call this "ground clear." It killed some of the smaller weeds, but left others. I applied a heavily concentrated amount in the area I wanted to clear off and it still didn't kill all the crab grass and certain weeds. The smaller ones died pretty quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions exactly. Put it into the sprayer and sprayed a whole gallon around my screen enclosure. 2 weeks later, the weeds are still there and green as ever!! Not even a wilted weed. Mixed vinegar, salt, water and a few drops of dish soap and within a few hours. they were wilting. Make your own and don't waste your time or money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t not perform like advertised. In a month and a half span I sprayed the entire yard (different weed type variations throughout) and saw no impact after 2 rounds of sprays (about a week or two In between ) Finally, for the third round and I did a one gallon 50/50 water and concentration. Only then did I see a difference
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyntara

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Kills weeds pretty good but takes its time. Only issue is I have to use more than expected to make one gallon for my sprayer. This means less applications for one bottle. What I want to see is does it prevent weeds for the 1 year like it states. That will be the ultimate test but we will have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had better luck with this years ago but it’s no longer working.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t do anything to my weeds or vegetation. I followed instructions and applied on a sunny day and applied twice and the weeds had no impact. Must have gotten a bad batch this time around?
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Ortho ground clear NOTHING
customer_reviews.text: This product must have been a reject.. Was mixed properly used the complete gallon and weeds still after a week. Bottle shows see results in 6 hours, no results in 6 days even, I am going to return the empty bottle for a refund or have Amazon send out another to see if this first one was a fluke .
customer_reviews.author: Wii oldtyme player

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a year to keep weeds away. This year I wanted a little longer and had a few weeds in the yard. For some reason all the weeds did not die and i used quite a bit on the areas with weeds. It does keep the weeds away, but if you get a lot of rain it does not last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Takes a good 10 days but it will kill weeds.
customer_reviews.text: After using this, I have to change my negative review. It took it about 10 days to kill weeds. But it definitely killed the weeds. Even though I mixed it up a little stronger, I had waited about 5 days and it didn't seem to work, however after about 10 days or so, it worked well. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't kill everything but great general purpose weed killer
customer_reviews.text: I spray this on my yard every year and slowly over the years things are getting better. After about a week everything I spray is dead except for a few things like violets which require something special. I'll keep using it and it does seem to have a long term effect if you are consistent.
customer_reviews.author: CKDad

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in southern Arizona!
customer_reviews.text: We live in southern Arizona and have nothing but rock. I chose this based off of reviews and it 100% didn’t work. We mixed it according to the directions and nada. Went back two weeks later and added a lot more of the solution than directed and still nada. Maybe works better in different climates but definitely didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: bnb13

customer_reviews.title: directions?
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use the product but was very disappointed that there were no use directions on the gallon of concentrate that I purchased. The internet says when to use (sunny days over 60 degrees F), precautions about tree roots (do not use over areas where tree roots will be or near fences when there may be something growing on the other side) or even the mixing directions (1 Quart of the product to 1 Gallon of water). This information and more should have been provided in the product description or, at the very least, on the bottle itself!
customer_reviews.author: oonwayvos

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this stuff works! I have a lot of weeds that have been resistant to everything else, and pulling them doesn't seem to do any good. I used this and all the weeds died! You still have to pull out the dead weeds, but they don't fight you, and they don't come back. This is definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Neiderhiser

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product!
customer_reviews.text: Says it will last up to one year, I mixed it extra strong and it still only lasted six weeks before grass started growing back in my driveway I would not recommend this I could have used bleach and Saved a lot of money with the same results
customer_reviews.author: D.L

customer_reviews.title: was by far the best (not tried the new formula)
customer_reviews.text: make sure you get concentrate and add your own water. i make it 1 part product to 3 parts water. works good and fast. kills and treats soil too. no regrowth for months if used properly. been using it for many years (25+).
customer_reviews.author: mark d.

customer_reviews.title: mostly works
customer_reviews.text: My desert landscaping has a lot of open area covered with rocks. The rain brought out a lot of weeds. Mixed it a little stronger, but it took 2 tries in a lot of places. Most of them are dying off now.
customer_reviews.author: dancer

customer_reviews.title: Buy concentrate and be aggressive!
customer_reviews.text: These really do last a long time. Make sure to buy concentrate so you can stretch those dollars. A year? It cuts it close. But it lasts a long time. If aggressive in the beginning of the season, you can enjoy it all year! Make sure you wait until the temperature is above 60° or it doesn't work. It's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Dawn Parent

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This weed killer does more than just kill weeds. My rocks and ditch had no weeds, grasses, or any other unwanted growth after using! It's powerful and doesn't need to be used more than the mix's instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Give it time because it works..
customer_reviews.text: I used this product and it didn’t work right away so I returned it for a refund and I got to looking at what I sprayed and it had all died. Wish I had kept it. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: patsy ann ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large area of rock around the yard and used the Ortho Ground Clear to rid the weeds and was more than satisfied with the results. I was so pleased I ordered another container to use on my other yard.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Groundclear is superior to other weedkillers
customer_reviews.text: I have used Groundclear for years and its great. Lasts about one year (here in the AZ desert) as advertised. The local big box stores stopped selling it this year so I bought Round-up. Just didn't work for me. So glad to find Groundclear on-line. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Duckyfish

customer_reviews.title: does not work and is not the same a grass and weed killer.
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to kill a small patch of weeds mixed with Bermuda grass. I applied according to the directions, Nothing died. I reapplied to the same area with double the dose and still only minor browning of some broad leaf weeds, the grass appears untouched. I've used Ortho grass and weed killer and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: Applied this product....twice...according to specified directions. There was no rain. After four days.....no noticeable change.
customer_reviews.author: Khazadoom

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: It takes 2 to 3 days to see results but I have been using this product for years and it last a very long time once applied.
customer_reviews.author: ProcessThyme

customer_reviews.title: Kills everything
customer_reviews.text: works better when you mix it stronger and with a pump sprayer kills everything over night or 1 week at most - hose sprayer adds to much water.
customer_reviews.author: I buy to much

customer_reviews.title: Kills weeds dead.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does. Like the concentrate because we have a large yard, and it doesn't make sense for me to pay someone else to water it down for me.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Highly Effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Easy to use. Highly effective. I have a 2-gallon pump sprayer. It does a great job. Weeds dry up so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Took multiple spraying to finally get all vegetation killed.
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions perfectly. Took 4 sprayings to get all vegetation killed. There wasn’t any rain that interfered either. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave York Pa

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on large area of weeds and followed diluting directions exactly and used gallon sprayer. 48 hours later, the weeds look as healthy as ever. This stuff did nothing. Waste of money. Use Roundup, it does work
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Only buy this if you want something that works.
customer_reviews.text: And does it ever! This is absolutely the finest herbicide I have ever used. Don't waste your time or money on anything less.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Allman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the results, once applied walk away it may not look dead at first but I assure you it is...Best on the market today
customer_reviews.author: Bikers56flh

customer_reviews.title: Works great in killing most grass/weeds
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Takes a little longer than it claims but within 24 hrs it killed everything that I sprayed on. I have seen some weeds pop back up after a week, but I will try a second spray and I think that will stop anything additional from growing in my gravel path
customer_reviews.author: j1693

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff but the price has more than doubled in less than a month. Funny how a virus will make prices double.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Price for the size was high!
customer_reviews.text: My fault, I failed to check the size of the bottle. The price and size I can but from our local farm store is a lot better than the price that I can order online. I will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: does not kill as fast as we had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: yes it does seem to start working right away but the grass . weeds are still fairly green after 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Arr

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works
customer_reviews.text: it takes it little longer than it says,but it works well a gallon is just not much coverage
customer_reviews.author: Don R

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Not a product review rather a I got 1 gallon of Ortho ground clear review. The same as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: QWERTY

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works on weeds.
customer_reviews.text: I have places where the weeds have not come back in a year. Best product I have found
customer_reviews.author: cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Best Weed & Grass Killer EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Ground Clear for 10 years and find it to be the best I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years. Kills grass and weeds and they do not come back for 10 - 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Looking For a Deal

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love to use this on my fence line and areas like my driveway. It works really well even on tough to kill weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rankin

customer_reviews.title: GroundClear works very well
customer_reviews.text: The Ortho GroundClear Vegetation Killer Concentrate works so well. I have cleared poison Ivy and oak with this, so allergic to them. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kathy Helmke

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: We use Groundclear every year and it lasts most of the summer here in AZ. Dilution ratio appears to be spot on as it kills weeds very affectively. The smell isn't terrible, and mixes well with a dye.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works a little too well!
customer_reviews.text: Keep at least a 2 barrier from the things you want to stay alive. I used this on a 5 foot wide dog run...killed close to 8 feet of grass
customer_reviews.author: Joe Solar

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Within a month the weeds and grass have kinda just disappeared!? This stuff does nit work like the usual weed killer. Its not fast and you wont see them shrivel up and turn yellow in a cpl hrs. It takes weeks but it sure does the job. Jus be careful how u spray it cuz it will kill everything
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Kills anything I spray it on
customer_reviews.text: Killed all the weeds I sprayed it on and nothing has started growing back in the two weeks since I sprayed. Only disappointed in how few batches you can make since it requires like 1/5 of the bottle per gallon but for the price it's acceptable
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t kill anything....
customer_reviews.text: 6hr results are bs. Applied product as directed on Wednesday, it’s now Friday and nothing has changed with the weeds I sprayed, still green and growing. Wish someone would actually make a product that works like it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: LISA FRIELING

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Does not kill weeds. Used to two applications and still have weeds does not do what it claims
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly effective but now Amazon will not ship to my locker. So bummed. But this an excellent product that really will kill weeds for a year if applied as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Dumpling

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Safer and better than other brands. A real value for the money too as one gal concentrate makes three gal liquid killer.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Milowski

customer_reviews.title: That for the price it beats all other brands that I have used down thru the years!
customer_reviews.text: It really is rainproof in an hour and it really does kill like it says and does a very good job when used as directed. I don't like to constantly spray I like to spray once or twice a summer and this product does the job!
customer_reviews.author: the fix it man

customer_reviews.title: 24 oz to a galon
customer_reviews.text: mix ratio does not allow for efficient use @ 24 oz per gallon of water
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for killing weeds between concrete walkways or patios.
customer_reviews.author: Gina--Baby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to mix and use and killed everything that was sprayed thank you
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this once a year in May to spray an area behind my deck. It really works for a year if you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: artman

customer_reviews.title: Works but,
customer_reviews.text: The instructions say you will see a change in about 6 hours, how about 6 DAYS. Can not comment at this point how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I have used
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed in package it’s states that you will see results in 6 hours. Followed directions used at optimum temp. 6 days and all the weeds etc doing great as if sprayed with fertilizer. Don’t waste you money
customer_reviews.author: B. Neely Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The product does work but it did take two applications
customer_reviews.author: melissa k bell

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I used my Ortho Dial N Spray Hose End Sprayer to spray the weeds at a distance and it worked better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Takes a very long time to work
customer_reviews.text: Takes about three days and many reapplications to have any effect
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Best used in a sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for years. Great for sidewalk and driveway cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: The Weeds Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My first application with product I mixed at the recommended amount. The weeds were at best stunted after 10 days. My second application I mixed 50/50. Too soon to see results. Years ago this product performed to full expectations. Doesn’t work anymore. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: It kills the unwanted grass fast and last up to 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Jim. G

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Won’t be having anymore weeds after one application. Just amazing. Kills weeds and keeps them away.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Ortho GroundClear Vegetation Killer
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is slow working and takes more than one application.
customer_reviews.author: Pops_Silva_Fox

customer_reviews.title: This really works.
customer_reviews.text: Really does the job on gravel road, on concrete separation cracks, and along borders of walkway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST PRODUCT AND YOU CAN DEPEND ON THE RESULTS EVERYTIME
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes longer than stated, but works
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't kill within hours like it states, takes days and sometimes requires additional coating of it. But since I got the weeds to die, they haven't come back
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Best for our yard!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this and use it where I want nothing else to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Save you money
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed . I used this in my gravel driveway and it's been almost 2 weeks and all it did was turn weeds slightly yellow. I used Roundup and in two days all. That's in my gravel driveway is gravel.
customer_reviews.author: tkm1975

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this stuff for years to keep my sidewalks and driveway clear of weeds and grass.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we have continued to use this every year. wipes out the weeds. will continue to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: momof1baby1manbaby3dogs

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Spectrum Vegetation Killer. I had read about this product, and expected it to work faster. It doesn't. I'm disappointed. It gets the job done, but takes awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Husbands

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We have a rock area that was FULL of weeds! This killed every weed in the area. We sprayed this stuff a few months ago and the weeds are still gone and not coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Paille

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little fickle...sometimes it works and other times it doesn't
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As always a excellent product, works great, and will be ordering more soon....thank you.
customer_reviews.author: William Boone

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle
customer_reviews.text: Received the product and it leaked through a big order today and damaged the rest of my products and their boxes. I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Did the job........
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Needed something to stop groundcover from the neighbors yard. It killed it all. Been 6 months and nothing has come back.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good price and works as well or better than Roundup
customer_reviews.author: Lil Texas

customer_reviews.title: Kills everything
customer_reviews.text: Kills everything. Maybe a little too powerful. Don't spray anywhere unless you don't want to grow anything there for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Knauss

customer_reviews.title: Weed killer
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than others but I’m guessing we have chemical resistant weeds
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It takes about a week for you to see your weeds or unwanted grass to disappear!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Not a consentrate
customer_reviews.text: Works, bit not as advertised. Takes at least two days to see results. Not affective if mixed with water, which makes it much less cost effective than other options. Should not be marketed as a concentrate.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product we have used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Does a very good job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but it takes me 5 gals for a pretty small yard. Hard to pour out of the gal container without drips off the spout and onto you - wear gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Eddington

customer_reviews.title: GROSSLY OVER-RATED PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: Zilch, zilch & zilch. Very bad choice in weed/grass control. Very slow acting. Takes 24 oz to a gal to use. Don't be fooled by the gallon concentrate nomenclature. There are other products that are far more economical and use the same identical ingredients. And there are even better weed/grass killers on the market that work faster and are far more economical. And I read other reviews which gave somewhat glowing accolades however most had some complaint about having to either re-apply or that product didn't last, etc. I'd say I got snookered. No more reliance on amazon reviews for decision making.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great it only took a couple of days to see results a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: C. Ray

customer_reviews.title: It works but it takes time
customer_reviews.text: Results in 6 hours??? What a joke! Results in one week, somewhat
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Savel

customer_reviews.title: A second application will probably be needed.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to kill weeds and grass, but I had to use a second application to complete the job.
customer_reviews.author: ghopper

product_meta.title: Ortho GroundClear Vegetation Killer Concentrate2, 1 gal.
product_meta.description: Ortho GroundClear Vegetation Killer Concentrate2 kills your unwanted vegetation and prevents regrowth for up to one year. You can see visible results in 6 hours as it kills weeds and grasses to the root. Our fast acting formula now has 5X* improved coverage and is rainproof in 1 hour. *when compared to previous formula.
feature_bullets: Kills and prevents weeds for up to 1 year
Treats 5X more area (when compared to previous formula)
Apply to driveways, sidewalks, fence lines, patios and gravel areas
Kills weeds and grasses to the root
